Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: {VV##62 : GHC.Types.Module | $k_##63}{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Data.Maybe_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 6: import Data.Maybe
 7: 
 8: {-@
 9: assume Data.Maybe.maybe :: v:b -> (a -> b) -> u:(GHC.Maybe.Maybe a) -> {w:b | not (isJust u) => w == v}
10: assume Data.Maybe.isNothing :: v:(GHC.Maybe.Maybe a) -> {b:Bool | not (isJust v) == b}
11: assume Data.Maybe.fromMaybe :: v:a -> u:(GHC.Maybe.Maybe a) -> {x:a | not (isJust u) => x == v}
12: 
13: assume Data.Maybe.isJust :: v:(GHC.Maybe.Maybe a) -> {b:Bool | b == isJust v}
14: measure isJust :: GHC.Maybe.Maybe a -> Bool
15:   isJust (GHC.Maybe.Just x)  = true
16:   isJust (GHC.Maybe.Nothing) = false
17: 
18: assume Data.Maybe.fromJust :: {v:(GHC.Maybe.Maybe a) | isJust v} -> a
19: measure fromJust :: GHC.Maybe.Maybe a -> a
20:   fromJust (GHC.Maybe.Just x) = x
21: @-}
